org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class GasTeXCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.GasTeXCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class GasTeXCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec
    This codec provides functions to encode an automaton to GasTeX.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Detail

      • O_LABEL_AS_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String O_LABEL_AS_NAME
        The option name of using state labels as state names when the automaton has labels on states.

      • O_CUSTOM_STATE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String O_CUSTOM_STATE_NAME
        The option name of using custom state name.

      • O_STATE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String O_STATE_NAME
        The option name of attributes displayed as the state name. The value is a string which can contain state property names. Each property name here must have a leading "$". For example, "$Name / $Label" will be displayed as the name of the state followed by " / " and the label of the state.

      • O_CUSTOM_TRANSITION_LABEL

        public static final java.lang.String O_CUSTOM_TRANSITION_LABEL
        The option name of using custom transition label.

      • O_TRANSITION_LABEL

        public static final java.lang.String O_TRANSITION_LABEL
        The option name of attributes displayed as the transition label.
        See Also:
        O_STATE_NAME

      • O_REPLACE_TRUE

        public static final java.lang.String O_REPLACE_TRUE
        The option name of replacing true with \mathit{true}.

      • O_REPLACE_NEGATION

        public static final java.lang.String O_REPLACE_NEGATION
        The option name of replacing ~ with \neg.

      • O_STACK_TRANSITION_LABELS

        public static final java.lang.String O_STACK_TRANSITION_LABELS
